abstract: The Blackstone Group is near a deal to buy Anheuser-Busch InBev’s theme parks unit for $2.5 billion to $3 billion, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: The Blackstone Group is near a deal to buy Anheuser-Busch InBev’s theme parks unit for $2.5 billion to $3 billion, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: The Blackstone Group could make a splash with its next leveraged buyout.

headline.main: Blackstone Nears Deal for Anheuser Theme Parks

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
